def solve():

    n, m = map(int, input().split())

    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    if n > m:

        print("NO")

        return

    sum_a = sum(a)

    max_a = max(a) if a else 0

    available = m -n 

    if sum_a > available:

        print("NO")

        return

    if max_a > available //2:

        print("NO")

    else:

        print("YES")

    n, m = map(int, input().split())

    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    if n > m:

        print("NO")

        return

    max_a = max(a) if a else 0

    available = m - n

    if sum_a > available:

        print("NO")

        return

    if max_a > available // 2:

        print("NO")

    else:

        print("YES")
